comments:
When I start Eclipse with the latest version of the CDT, I get the following trace in the "C/C++ Projects" window.  My workspace consists of two C projects.  Both of these projects contain nothing but links to the remote directories where the source files reside (I'm at a workstation, and the code is stored and built on a server).  If I close the "C/C++ Projects" window and reset the view, the projects show up correctly.
